mapper.select: SELECT eo.experience_order_id, eo.customer_id, eo.experience_name, eo.experience_order_people, eo.experience_order_startdate, eo.experience_order_enddate, ep.experience_payment_method, ep.experience_payment_method_number, ep.experience_payment_money, ep.create_Date, ep.update_Date FROM experience_payment ep LEFT JOIN experience_order eo ON ep.experience_order_id = eo.experience_order_id where eo.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY ep.create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{ROW_PER_PAGE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO experience_order( customer_id, experience_name, experience_order_people, experience_order_startdate, experience_order_enddate, create_Date, update_Date ) VALUES( #{customerId}, #{experienceName}, #{experienceOrderPeople}, #{experienceOrderStartDate}, #{experienceOrderEndDate}, now(), now() )
